name: AlcoholAndDrugDependence
title: Alcohol and Drug Dependence
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent alcohol and drug dependence.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with alcohol and drug abuse and dependence. This is a grouping of ICD-10CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes related to alcohol and drug use.)
